title: Cigar Trivia! 20 Cigar Questions & 20 Cigar Prizes
itunes:title: Cigar Trivia! 20 Cigar Questions & 20 Cigar Prizes
description:
LIVE from the Toscano Sound Stage at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe above Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH, The Cigar Authority brings to you our first ever game of Cigar Trivia. We have 20 questions and 20 prizes. In order to be eligible to win you must be watching the show on The Cigar Authority Facebook page, You Tube Live or TheCigarAuthority.com chat room.

While we invite you to always share our show, we will only be monitoring these 3 chat spaces for winners. We will do this while we smoke 2 cigars from The Cigar Authority Care Package. In the first hour we will light up the  Don Lino Africa. In the second hour, we will light up the United Cigar collaboration with Hammer + Sickle; Series Unidas. Our lighter of choice for the day is the Vertigo Falcon.

We will have this and all the usual suspects including Versus, Offer of the Day, E-Mail of the Week, Cigar News and a peek into the Asylum. The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH.Never miss an episode by subscribing to the show via Apple Podcasts and Podbean.
